scripts.generate-client: pnpx @algorandfoundation/algokit-client-generator@4.0.0-beta.4 generate -a contracts/artifacts/StakingPool.arc56_draft.json -o contracts/clients_new/StakingPoolClient.ts && pnpx @algorandfoundation/algokit-client-generator@4.0.0-beta.4 generate -a contracts/artifacts/ValidatorRegistry.arc56_draft.json -o contracts/clients_new/ValidatorRegistryClient.ts && algokit generate client contracts/artifacts/ --language typescript  --output contracts/clients/{contract_name}Client.ts && ./update_contract_artifacts.sh
scripts.noalgobuild: pnpm run compile-contract -- --skip-algod && pnpm run generate-client
scripts.build: pnpm run compile-contract && pnpm run generate-client
